metadata.title: CVE-2024-24510 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Alinto SOGo before 5.10.0 allows aremote attacker to execute arbitrary code via the import function to themail component.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-24510` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sogo - 5.11.0-1
sogo-activesync - 5.11.0-1
sogo-common - 5.11.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sogo package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.11.0-1').
